info.name: Deities
info.description: Deities from the Sword Coast Adventurer’s Guide.
info.author: Wizards of the Coast

setters.set: Three inverted triangles arranged in a long triangle
Left hand pointing upward, outlined in fire
Upright black right hand, thumb and fingers together
Skull surrounded by a ring of blood droplets
Sheaf of grain or a blooming rose over grain
White jawless skull on black or purple sunburst
Lit candle above an open eye
Paw print with a five-pointed star in its center
Staring eye on upright left gauntlet
A coin with a two-faced head

sheet.description: Faerunian god of revenge and retribution

setters.set: Hands bound at the wrist with red cord
Upright skeletal arm holding balanced scales
Point-down triangle containing a swirl of mist
Circle of seven stars, or nine stars encircling a flowing red mist, or a single star
Red knight lanceboard piece with stars for eyes
Crystal ball containing many kinds of eyes
Pair of eyes surrounded by seven stars
Black disk encircled with a purple border
Face of a beautiful red-haired woman
Three lightning bolts radiating from a central point
Balanced scales resting on a warhammer
A cloud and three lightning bolts
Upright coin with Waukeen’s profile facing left

sheet.description: goddess of of hearth and home

description.p: duergar goddess of conquest and psionics

sheet.description: duergar goddess of conquest and psionics

setters.set: Mountain silhouette with a central gemstone
Upright sword whose blade is spiraled in flame

description.p: duergar god of magic and slavery

sheet.description: duergar god of magic and slavery

setters.set: Upright mace in front of a tall boot
Gold coin with the face of a dwarf

description.p: triple goddess of wisdom and protection

setters.set: Triangle with three interlocking circles within

sheet.description: triple goddess of wisdom and protection

description.p: god of time, history, and philosophy

sheet.description: god of time, history, and philosophy

description.p: goddess of divination, dreams, travel, and death

sheet.description: goddess of divination, dreams, travel, and death

setters.set: Sword-wielding dancing drow female silhouetted against the full moon
Female drow hand wearing many silver rings
Black mask with blue glass lenses inset over eyes

description.p: god of mining and carving stone

setters.set: Golden signet ring with six-pointed star

sheet.description: god of mining and carving stone

description.p: god of earth and the dead

sheet.description: god of earth and the dead

setters.set: White clawed mole emerging from ground
Red crescent moon with a skull between the moon's horns
